title: Panic Selling Grips China Tech Stocks Again as Concerns Pile Up - Yahoo Finance
content: Panic Selling Grips China Tech Stocks Again as Concerns Pile Up  Yahoo Finance
description: (Bloomberg) -- The relentless selloff in Chinese technology stocks continued in Hong Kong on Monday as a lockdown in Shenzhen, a key sector hub, added to investor angst over geopolitical and regulatory risks.
